thread.title: Emerging-Market Currencies: It’s Not Just About the Fed
thread.title_full: Emerging-Market Currencies: It’s Not Just About the Fed - WSJ

author: Richard Barley
title: Emerging-Market Currencies: It’s Not Just About the Fed
text:
Emerging-market currencies have dealt investors an unhappy hand as focus on a U.S. interest-rate increase has built. The Brazilian real has fallen more than 30% against the dollar this year; the Turkish lira hit a record low this week; the Malaysian ringgit is down 17%.
But the U.S. Federal Reserve isn't the only risk investors have to contend with: commodities, Chinese growth and domestic vulnerabilities are in the mix. A Fed rate increase might reduce uncertainty, one component of the emerging-market selloff; a pause...
